text:
it looks like `module` properties do not show up over proxy. This works fine in production but uses the default value over proxy:
```export const query = `
# $tag_id: "{{ module.tag_id.id }}"
query BlogPostsQuery($tag_id: [Number]! = 133999335798) {
...```
`module.tag_id.id` is being added via fields.tsx
